contexts.context: ...the revolutionists are not far from our lands. <mark>Wherever</mark> they go, they will unleash all of their wrath...
...years already, this evildoer has been following us <mark>wherever</mark> we go. Every false accusation, every defamation,...
...of my evil heart on you. Now go <mark>wherever</mark> you want to. Your path leads you to death...
